## useNetworkMismatch() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useNetworkMismatch(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`false` if the chainId of the wallet is the same as the desired chainId passed into <ThirdwebProvider />
